Full Version or Trial?

Install the game, Do the following:

1. Block game in firewall. 
2. Go to Settings (GAMEPLAY) 
3. UNCHECK -ONLINE NEWS- 
4. DONT USE STREAMED RADIO IN GAME, TOO! 
5. Its done! You dont need crack, and you can use patches. 

Now you can use activation code.

sample: 

 7KWDE-K9MV0-KFM10-ACJ2Q-HY9KZ 

Now it's done and 100% works. Enjoy your game.

For those of you who are already playing and It still asks for Activation I found a work around that is working for me.

1. Block game .exe with a good Firewall, if you are unsure if It will work or not just disable the whole internet as I did.

2. Uncheck "Online News" in-game going to "Options > Gameplay".

3. Now close the game and go to "My Documents > Euro Truck Simulator 2" and open the file "config.cfg" with Notepad or any other txt editor you'd like.

4. Look for the following line in config.cfg >>> uset g_sns "(junk here)" > uset g_sns ""
